items.sentence: Scientists have discovered a new type of magnet.
If your job were easy, someone else would do it.
I'd like to make a reservation for this weekend.
Tom lives in Los Angeles, the home of Hollywood.
Wait for me. I'll be there in about ten minutes.
Pigeons may be able to detect gravity anomalies.
If the saddle is too heavy, the mule won't move.
I've never been spoken to by a foreigner before.
Why do girls care so much about what guys think?
What time did your plane finally land in Boston?
Was Tom the one who told you you had to do that?
Don't forget you need to pay your rent tomorrow.
You're the only person that can help me do that.
I can always count on Tom to do the right thing.
Tom painted a self-portrait and gave it to Mary.
Why do you suspect Tom was the one who did that?
I suspect Tom would be interested in doing that.
I suspect Tom isn't going to do that by himself.
I suspect Tom doesn't want to do that with Mary.
I suspect Tom didn't want to do that by himself.
